#summary set(any[functionName])
#labels api,0.9.1

*Category*:

[ConfigurationFunctions Configuration Functions]

*Description*:

Use to configure a global setting.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| _any_ || string || true || - || Name/value to set ||
|| *functionName* || string || false ||   || The name of the function when setting a default value for an argument ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset set(URLRewriting="Partial")> <!--- can be set to "On", "Off" or "Partial" --->
<cfset set(dataSourceName="")>
<cfset set(dataSourceUserName="")>
}}}

{{{
<cfset set(functionName="average", distinct=false)>
<cfset set(functionName="buttonTo", onlyPath=true, host="", protocol="", port=0, text="", confirm="", image="", disable="")>
}}}

*Related*:

 * [ConfigurationandDefaults ConfigurationandDefaults] (chapter)
 * [get get()] (function)
